abstract: Stock market makes gains due to broad rally led by technology and health care companies, erasing losses sustained over previous two days.
lead_paragraph: Rising oil prices and encouraging data on housing and consumer confidence helped lift stocks.

headline.main: Broad Rally for Market as Energy Sector Rebounds
headline.print_headline: Broad Rally for Market as Energy Sector Rebounds

snippet: Rising oil prices and encouraging data on housing and consumer confidence helped lift stocks.
